Description: Tesla, Inc.(formerly Tesla Motors, Inc.), is an American automotive and energy company based in Palo Alto, California.The company specializes in electric car manufacturing and, through its SolarCity subsidiary, solar panel manufacturing.It operates multiple production and assembly plants, such as Gigafactory near Reno, Nevada, and its main vehicle manufacturing facility at Tesla Factory in Fremont, California. As of March 2019, Tesla sells Model S,Model X,and Mode XA3 cars.

We strongly believe that buying a pre-owned car should be an enjoyable and comfortable experience for all our customers. The atmosphere in our dealership gives you complete confidence in our ability to find the right car that suits your life style.

Subaru is the automobile manufacturing division of Japanese transportation conglomerate Subaru Corporation (formerly known as Fuji Heavy Industries), the twenty-second largest automaker by production worldwide in 2012

BuySide Auto (formerly Roadster) is a car buying website and auto broker for new cars. This will be the most stress-free car buying experience of your life. We get clients the best market price and terms on their new automobile. Our Roadster Concierge team will handle everything for you. This includes helping to decide on the right car, comparing lease programs to financing programs, negotiating the transaction, and dealing with your trade-in.
